argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: TRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.).

argument.name: <SQL::IndexInfo>
argument.description: A SQL::IndexInfo object and having (at a minimum) a value for the .name property.

argument.name: Column
argument.description: A SQL::IndexColumnInfo object and having (at a minimum) a value for the .name property.

page.discussion: The AddColumn() method adds a new column definition to an index definition.
page.example: dim IndexInfo as SQL::IndexInfo dim IndexColumn as SQL::IndexColumnInfo

section.description: The .Name properties of the SQL::IndexInfo and SQL::IndexColumnInfo objects are required before calling the AddColumn() method.
section.example: IndexInfo.Name = "Primary_Key" IndexInfo.PrimaryKey = .t. IndexColumn.Name = "MyColumnName" if .not. IndexInfo.AddColumn(IndexColumn) then ui_msg_box("Error", "Could not add index") end if ui_msg_box("Index Column Definition", IndexInfo.XML)
